sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The eating of blood vindicated: in a briefe answer to a late pamphlet, intiutled, A bloody tenent confuted.
8 p.
Printed for H. Shepheard, at the Bible in Tower-Street, and W. Ley, at Pauls Chaine, near Doctors Commons, London : 1646.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "march: 9th"; the 6 in imprint date crossed out and date altered to 1645. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
